original:
Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

Foundry Note

This bonus has been included in the beast's global bonuses.
translation:
将你的熟练加值加到野兽进行的一切属性检定和豁免检定上。

Foundry贴士

此加值已包含于野兽的全局加值中。

original:
Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 2 plus your Wisdom modifier Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage (your choice when you summon the beast). If the beast moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target before the hit, the target takes an extra 1d6 damage of the same type, and the target has the &Reference[prone] condition if it is a Large or smaller creature.

Foundry Note

The Attack and Charging Attack activities will allow you to choose the damage type in the roll dialog. You should choose one damage type and use it consistently until resummoning your companion.

The Charging Attack activity includes the additional damage.

Additionally, they have force as a damage option which should only be used once you reach level 7 and get the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrExceptiona]{Exceptional Training} feature.
translation:
近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中： 1d8 + 2 + 你的感知调整值穿刺、挥砍或钝击伤害（于召唤时选择）。若野兽在此次攻击前立即向着该目标直线移动了至少 20 尺，则其额外受到 1d6 与攻击伤害类型相同的伤害，若目标体型不超过巨型，则其还会陷入倒地 &Reference[prone] 状态。

Foundry贴士

此攻击和冲锋攻击活动允许你在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。你应当选择一种伤害类型，并且直至你重新召唤你的行侣为止一直使用那种类型的伤害。

冲锋攻击活动包含了额外伤害。

此外，这两项活动均可以选择力场作为其伤害类型，但只应在你到达 7 级并获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrExceptiona]{特效训练}特性后才能选择。

key: entries->Beast of the Land->items->Beast’s Strike->activities->Charging Attack->name

original: The beast can breathe air and water.
translation: 野兽能在空气和水中呼吸。

original:
Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

Foundry Note

This bonus has been included in the beast's global bonuses.
translation:
将你的熟练加值加到野兽进行的一切属性检定和豁免检定上。

Foundry Note

该加值已经包含在野兽的全局加值中。

original:
Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 2 plus your Wisdom modifier Bludgeoning or Piercing damage (your choice when you summon the beast), and the target has the &Reference[grappled] condition (escape DC equals your spell save DC).

Foundry Note

The Attack activity will allow you to choose the damage type in the roll dialog. You should choose one damage type and use it consistently until resummoning your companion.

Additionally, they have force as a damage option which should only be used once you reach level 7 and get the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrExceptiona]{Exceptional Training} feature.
translation:
近战攻击检定： 加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d6 + 2 + 你的感知调整值钝击或穿刺伤害（于召唤时选择），且目标陷入 &Reference[grappled] 状态（逃脱DC等于你的法术豁免DC）。

Foundry Note

攻击行动将允许你在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。你应该选择一种伤害类型，并持续使用它，直到重新召唤你的行侣。

此外，它们有力量作为伤害掷骰属性，只有当你到达 7 级并获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrExceptiona]{特效训练} 特性时才应该使用。

original: The beast doesn’t provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.
translation: 野兽飞行离开敌人的触及时不会引发借机攻击。

original:
Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

Foundry Note

This bonus has been included in the beast's global bonuses.
translation:
将你的熟练加值加到野兽进行的一切属性检定和豁免检定上。

original:
Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d4 + 3 plus your Wisdom modifier Slashing damage.

Foundry Note

The Attack activity will allow you to choose the damage type in the roll dialog. You should choose one damage type and use it consistently until resummoning your companion.

Additionally, they have force as a damage option which should only be used once you reach level 7 and get the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrExceptiona]{Exceptional Training} feature.
translation:
近战攻击检定： 加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中： 1d4 + 3 + 你的感知调整值挥砍伤害。

Foundry Note

攻击 行动将允许你在掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。你应该选择一种伤害类型，并持续使用它，直到重新召唤你的行侣。

此外，它们有力量作为伤害掷骰属性，只有当你到达7级并获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbrgrExceptiona]{特效训练} 特性时才应该使用。

original: At the start of each of its turns, the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] target repeats the [[/save ability=dex]] save. On a failed save, the target takes 4d8 (plus 2d8 for each spell slot level above 5) damage of the spirit’s type. On a successful save, the target isn’t Restrained by the spirit.
translation: 在精魂 5 尺内开始其回合时，若没有生物被精魂束缚，施法者可以迫使其进行一次 [[/save ability=dex]] 豁免。失败则目标受到 8d8 的对应精魂类型的伤害并且直到法术结束为止，目标处于 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态。在处于束缚状态的目标回合开始时，其重新豁免，失败则目标受到 4d8 的对应精魂类型的伤害，豁免成功则目标不再被精魂束缚。

original: Whenever the pack moves within 10 feet of a creature you can see and whenever a creature you can see enters a space within 10 feet of the pack or ends its turn there, you can force that creature to make a Dexterity saving throw. translation: 只要该集群移动到你所能看到的生物 10 尺范围内，或者只要你所能看到的生物进入集群 10 尺范围内的空间，或者在该空间结束其回合时，你就能迫使该生物进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败的话，该生物会受到 3d10 点挥砍伤害。每个回合，该生物只能进行一次此类豁免。

original: The spirit touches another creature. The target regains Hit Points equal to 2d8 + the spell’s level.

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

original: Strength Saving Throw: DC 12, one Medium or smaller creature the snake can see within 5 feet. Failure: 7 (3d4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the &Reference[grappled] condition (escape DC 12).

original: When a creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the spirit, the spirit can target it with magical energy if the spirit can see it. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, the target. Failure: Until the start of its next turn, the target can’t make Opportunity Attacks, and its Speed is halved.

original: The insect can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

original: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

original: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and it knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

original: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature the spider can see within 60 feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[restrained] condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage.

original: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Bludgeoning damage, or the goat deals 2 (1d4) Bludgeoning damage if it moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+2，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点钝击伤害，或者如果山羊在击中目标前至少直线移动了 20 尺，造成 2（1d4）点钝击伤害。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Slashing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点挥砍伤害。

original: Magical Darkness doesn’t impede the imp’s Darkvision.
translation: 魔法黑暗不会影响小魔鬼的黑暗视觉。

original: The imp has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
translation: 小魔鬼对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 6（1d6 + 3）穿刺伤害外加 7（2d6）毒素伤害。

original:
The imp casts [[/item oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1]] on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

@Embed[.oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1 caption=false]
translation:
小魔鬼对自身施展 [[/item oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1]] ，无需任何法术成分并使用魅力作为施法属性。

@Embed[.oHafKbzbqYGiL4i1 caption=false]

original: The imp shape-shifts to resemble a rat (Speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., Fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., Climb 20 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it’s wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.
translation: 小魔鬼变形为一只老鼠（速度 20 尺）、渡鸦（20 尺，飞行 60 尺）或蜘蛛（20 尺，攀爬 20 尺）的形象，或是变回其真实形态。除速度外，其各形态下的数据皆相同。它携带或着装的任何装备都不会随之变化。

original: A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.
translation: 你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

original: The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.
translation: 如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

速度： 1 mph

船员： 1

乘员： —

货物（吨）： 1/2

AC： 15

HP： 100

伤害阈值： 10

价格： 3,000 GP

original: The lion has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.
translation: 若狮子的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个狮子未失能的盟友，则狮子对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

original: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can Long Jump up to 25 feet.
translation: 狮子在助跑 10 尺后可以跳远至多 25 尺。

original: The lion makes two [[/item Rend]] attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with a use of [[/item Roar]].
translation: 狮子发动两次 [[/item 撕裂]] 攻击。它可以将其中一次攻击替换为使用 [[/item 咆哮]]。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：7（1d8 + 3）挥砍伤害。

original: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 11, one creature within 15 feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the lion’s next turn.
translation: 感知豁免：DC 11，单一 15 尺内的生物。失败：目标陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态，持续直至狮子的下一回合开始。

original: The target has the &Reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the lion’s next turn.
translation: 感知豁免：DC 11，单一 15 尺内的生物。失败：目标陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态，持续直至狮子的下一回合开始。

original: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
translation: 蜥蜴可以在难以攀爬的表面上攀爬，包括倒吊在天花板上，而不需要为此进行属性检定。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+2，触及 5 尺。命中：1 穿刺伤害。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Piercing damage, and the target has the &Reference[prone] condition if it is Large or smaller.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d6 + 1）穿刺伤害，且目标若体型为大或更小则陷入 &Reference[prone apply=false] 状态。

original: The mule counts as one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.
translation: 在决定骡的载重能力时，其被视为更大一级的体型。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）钝击伤害。

original: The octopus can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without spending extra movement to do so.
translation: 章鱼可以移动穿过最窄 1 寸宽的缝隙。

original: Trigger: A creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the octopus while underwater. Response: The octopus releases ink that fills a 5-foot Cube centered on itself, and the octopus moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is &Reference[heavilyobscured] for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.
translation: 触发：于水中期间，一个生物在章鱼 5 尺内结束其回合。响应：章鱼释放出墨水覆盖以自己为源点的 5 尺立方区域，且章鱼立即移动等于其游泳速度的距离。该立方区域在 1 分钟内变为 &Reference[heavilyobscured] ，当有强力水流或类似效应将墨水击散时，该效应提前结束。

original: a creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the octopus while underwater
translation: 一个生物在章鱼 5 尺内结束其回合

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Bludgeoning damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点钝击伤害。

original: When you regain Hit Points from a level 1+ spell, the steed regains the same number of Hit Points if you’re within 5 feet of it.
translation: 当你从一道一环或以上的法术中恢复生命值时，若你位于坐骑 5 尺内，则坐骑也会恢复相同数量的生命值。

original: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 plus the spell’s level of Radiant (Celestial), Psychic (Fey), or Necrotic (Fiend) damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d8 + 法术环阶点光耀（天族）、心灵（妖精）、暗蚀（邪魔）伤害。

original: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, one creature within 60 feet the steed can see. Failure: The target has the &Reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the end of your next turn.
translation: 感知豁免：DC等同于你的法术豁免DC，一名距坐骑 60 尺内的可见生物。失败：目标直到你下个回合结束为止陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态。

original: The steed teleports, along with its rider, to an unoccupied space of your choice up to 60 feet away from itself.
translation: 坐骑连同其骑手传送至你选择的距其 60 尺内未占空间中。

original: One creature within 5 feet of the steed regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus the spell’s level.
translation: 一名距坐骑 5 尺内的生物恢复 2d8 + 法术环阶点生命值。

original: The owl doesn’t provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.
translation: 猫头鹰飞出敌人的触及范围时不会引起借机攻击。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Slashing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点挥砍伤害。

original: The panther makes one [[/item Pounce]] attack and uses [[/item Prowl]].
translation: 黑豹发动一次 [[/item 猛扑]] 攻击，并使用 [[/item 潜行]]。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage, or the panther deals 7 (2d4 + 2) Slashing damage if it had Advantage on the attack roll.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+4，攻击范围 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）挥砍伤害，若黑豹在攻击检定中具有优势，则造成 7（2d4 + 2）挥砍伤害。

original: The panther moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. At the end of this movement, the panther can take the &Reference[hide] action.
translation: 黑豹可移动达其移动速度的一半且不会引发机会攻击。在移动结束时，黑豹可以采取&Reference[hide] 动作。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）钝击伤害。

original: The pseudodragon has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
translation: 伪龙对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。
伪龙发动两次 [[/item 啃咬]] 攻击。

original: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the pseudodragon can see within 5 feet. translation: 体质豁免： DC 12，单一5尺内它可见的生物。失败： 5（2d4 + 2）毒素伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态 1 小时。 失败且差值 5 点或更多： 目标在中毒期间陷入 &Reference[unconscious apply=false] 状态直至其受到伤害或被另一生物用一个动作摇醒。

original: The target has the &Reference[poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour.
translation: 你陷入 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态 1 小时。

original: Failure by 5 or More: The Poisoned target also has the &Reference[unconscious apply=false] condition until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.
translation: 失败且差值 5 点或更多： 你在中毒期间陷入 &Reference[unconscious apply=false] 状态直至受到伤害或被另一生物用一个动作摇醒。

original: The quasit has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
translation: 夸塞魔在抵御法术及其他魔法效应的豁免检定上具有优势。

translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d4 + 3）挥砍伤害，且目标会陷入 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至该夸塞魔的下一个回合开始。

original: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 10, one creature within 20 feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[frightened apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.
translation: 感知豁免：DC 10，20 尺内的一名生物。失败：目标陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 。在其每个回合结束时，目标重复进行豁免检定，成功则该效果在自身上结束。1 分钟后，目标豁免自动成功。

在你每个回合结束时，你重复进行豁免检定，成功则该效果在自身上结束。1 分钟后，豁免自动成功。

translation: 虎发动一次 [[/item 猛扑]] 攻击，并使用 [[/item 潜行]]。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage. If the tiger had Advantage on the attack roll, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) Slashing damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, has the &Reference[prone] condition.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：6（1d6 + 3）挥砍伤害。若虎在攻击检定上有优势，目标会额外承受 3（1d6）挥砍伤害，且若目标体型为巨型或更小，则会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

original: The tiger moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. At the end of this movement, the tiger can take the &Reference[hide] action.
translation: 虎可移动达其移动速度的一半且不会引发机会攻击。在移动结束时，虎可以采取&Reference[hide] 动作。

original: Constitution Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, any creature (other than you) that starts its turn within a 5-foot Emanation originating from the spirit. Failure: The creature has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.
translation: 体质豁免：DC等于你的法术豁免DC，所有在以灵魄为源点 5 尺光环区域内开始其回合的生物（除了你）。失败：该生物陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至其下一回合开始。

original: any other creature that starts its turn within range
translation: 所有在以灵魄为源点 5 尺光环区域内开始其回合的生物（除了施法者）

original: The creature has the &Reference[poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.
translation: 该生物陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至其下一回合开始。

original: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[difficultterrain]. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes [[/damage 1d10 type=force]] damage for every 5 feet traveled.
translation: 灵魄可以虚体化并如同穿过 &Reference[difficultterrain]一样穿过其他生物和物件。如果它在自己的回合结束时仍处在物件内部，则被挪到距离最近的未被占据的位置，且每因此移动5尺便受到 [[/damage 1d10 type=force]] 伤害。

original:
The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell’s level (round down).

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{Number of attacks}
translation:
灵魄发动等于法术环阶一半次数的攻击（向下取整）。

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{攻击次数}

original: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell’s level Necrotic damage, and the target has the &Reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.
translation: 近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d8 + 3 + 法术环阶的暗蚀伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态直至其下一回合结束。

original: The &Reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.
translation: 你陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态直至其下一回合结束。

original: Ranged Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, range 150 ft. Hit: 2d4 + 3 + the spell’s level Necrotic damage.
translation: 远程攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，射程 150 尺。命中：2d4 + 3 + 法术环阶的暗蚀伤害。

original:
(Putrid Only)

Melee Attack Roll: Bonus: equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 3 + the spell’s level Slashing damage. If the target has the &Reference[poisoned apply=false] condition, it has the &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.
translation:
（仅腐尸）

近战攻击检定：加值等于你的法术攻击加值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d6 + 3 + 法术环阶的挥砍伤害。若目标具有 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态，则其还会陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] ，直至其下一回合结束。

original: If the target has the &Reference[poisoned apply=false] condition, it has the &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.
translation: 若你具有 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态，则还会陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] ，直至下一回合结束。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d4 + 2）穿刺伤害 + 3（1d6）毒素伤害。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the horse moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) Bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, has the &Reference[prone] condition.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+6，触及5尺。命中：9（2d4 + 4）钝击伤害。若战马在此次攻击前立即向着该目标直线移动了至少 20 尺，则其额外受到5（2d4）钝击伤害，若目标体型不超过巨型，则其还会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

速度： 2 1/2 mph

船员： 60

乘员： 60

货物（吨）： 200

AC： 15

HP： 500

伤害阈值： 20

价格： 25,000 GP

original: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+5，触及 5 尺。命中：造成 1 点穿刺伤害。

original: The wolf has Advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the wolf’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.
translation: 狼至少有一个未处于失能的盟友在目标生物 5 尺内时，它对该生物发动的攻击检定有优势。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage, and the target has the &Reference[prone] condition if it is Medium or smaller.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+4，触及 5 尺。命中：5（1d6 + 2）穿刺伤害， 且目标若体型为巨型或更小，则会陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

original: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.
translation: 当僵尸因受非光耀非重击伤害而使其生命值减至 0 时，它必须进行一次 DC 为 5＋所受伤害值的体质豁免，豁免成功则生命值降至 1。

original: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Bludgeoning damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：+3，触及 5 尺。命中：4（1d6 + 1）钝击伤害。

original: When you regain Hit Points from a level 1+ spell, the steed regains the same number of Hit Points if you’re within 5 feet of it.
translation: 当你从一道一环或以上的法术中恢复生命值时，若你位于坐骑 5 尺内，则坐骑也会恢复相同数量的生命值。

original: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 plus the spell’s level of Radiant damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d8 + 法术环阶的光耀伤害。

original: One creature within 5 feet of the steed regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus the spell’s level.
translation: 一名距坐骑 5 尺内的生物恢复 2d8 + 法术环阶点生命值。

original: When you regain Hit Points from a level 1+ spell, the steed regains the same number of Hit Points if you’re within 5 feet of it.
translation: 当你从一道一环或以上的法术中恢复生命值时，若你位于坐骑 5 尺内，则坐骑也会恢复相同数量的生命值。

original: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 plus the spell’s level of Psychic damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d8 + 法术环阶的心灵伤害。

original: The steed teleports, along with its rider, to an unoccupied space of your choice up to 60 feet away from itself.
translation: 坐骑连同其骑手传送至你选择的距其 60 尺内未占空间中。

original: When you regain Hit Points from a level 1+ spell, the steed regains the same number of Hit Points if you’re within 5 feet of it.
translation: 当你从一道一环或以上的法术中恢复生命值时，若你位于坐骑 5 尺内，则坐骑也会恢复相同数量的生命值。

original: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8 plus the spell’s level of Necrotic damage.
translation: 近战攻击检定：加值等同于你的法术攻击调整值，触及 5 尺。命中：1d8 + 法术环阶的暗蚀伤害。

original: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC equals your spell save DC, one creature within 60 feet the steed can see. Failure: The target has the &Reference[frightened] condition until the end of your next turn.
translation: 感知豁免：DC等同于你的法术豁免DC，一名距坐骑 60 尺内的可见生物。失败：目标直到你下个回合结束为止陷入 &Reference[frightened apply=false] 状态。

original:
Towering over most folk, goliaths are distant descendants of giants. Each goliath bears the favors of the first giants—favors that manifest in various supernatural boons, including the ability to quickly grow and temporarily approach the height of goliaths’ gigantic kin.

Goliaths have physical characteristics that are reminiscent of the giants in their family lines. For example, some goliaths look like stone giants, while others resemble fire giants. Whatever giants they count as kin, goliaths have forged their own path in the multiverse—unencumbered by the internecine conflicts that have ravaged giantkind for ages—and seek heights above those reached by their ancestors.

Goliath Traits

Creature Type: Humanoid

Size: Medium (about 7–8 feet tall)

Speed: 35 feet

As a Goliath, you have these special traits.

Giant Ancestry. You are descended from Giants. Choose one of the following benefits—a supernatural boon from your ancestry; you can use the chosen benefit a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest:

Cloud’s Jaunt (Cloud Giant). As a Bonus Action, you magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

Fire’s Burn (Fire Giant). When you hit a target with an attack roll and deal damage to it, you can also deal 1d10 Fire damage to that target.

Frost’s Chill (Frost Giant). When you hit a target with an attack roll and deal damage to it, you can also deal 1d6 Cold damage to that target and reduce its Speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

Hill’s Tumble (Hill Giant). When you hit a Large or smaller creature with an attack roll and deal damage to it, you can give that target the &Reference[Prone] condition.

Stone’s Endurance (Stone Giant). When you take damage, you can take a Reaction to roll 1d12. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled and reduce the damage by that total.

Storm’s Thunder (Storm Giant). When you take damage from a creature within 60 feet of you, you can take a Reaction to deal 1d8 Thunder damage to that creature.

Large Form. Starting at character level 5, you can change your size to Large as a Bonus Action if you’re in a big enough space. This transformation lasts for 10 minutes or until you end it (no action required). For that duration, you have Advantage on Strength checks, and your Speed increases by 10 feet. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest.

Powerful Build. You have Advantage on any saving throw you make to end the Grappled condition. You also count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity.
translation:
歌利亚比绝大多数族裔更高，巨人是这一族的远祖。每一个歌利亚都承载着元祖巨人的祝福，这些祝福体现在各种超自然恩惠中，包括快速成长并暂时接近巨人先祖高度的能力。

歌利亚的身体特征让人联想到家族血系来源的巨人。例如，一些歌利亚看起来像石巨人，而另一些则像火巨人。无论其宗族来于何种巨人，免受巨人多年内战蹂躏的歌利亚，都在多元宇宙中开辟了自己的道路，并试图超越祖先所达到的高度。

歌利亚特质 Goliath Traits

生物类型 Creature Type: 类人

体型 Size: 中型(约7-8尺高)

速度 Speed: 35 尺

作为歌利亚，你有以下特殊特质：

巨人血统 Giant Ancestry。 你是巨人的后裔。选择以下好处之一——来自你祖先的超自然恩惠；你可以使用所选恩惠的次数等于你的熟练加值，当你完成一次长休后，你重获全部已消耗的使用次数：

云游四方（云巨人）Cloud’s Jaunt (Cloud Giant)。 以一个附赠动作，你可以魔法般地传送到一处30尺内且未被占据的可见空间。

星火燎原（火巨人）Fire’s Burn (Fire Giant)。 当你使用攻击检定击中生物并对其造成伤害时，你可以使该生物受到额外 1d10 点火焰伤害。

凛若冰霜（霜巨人）Frost’s Chill (Frost Giant)。 当你使用攻击检定击中生物并对其造成伤害时，你可以使该生物受到额外 1d6 点 冷冻伤害，并且在你的下一回合开始前速度减少 10 尺。

地动山摇（山丘巨人）Hill’s Tumble (Hill Giant)。当你使用攻击检定击中大型或更小的生物并对其造成伤害时，你可以使该生物陷入" 倒地" 状态。

安如磐石（石巨人）Stone’s Endurance (Stone Giant)。 当你受到伤害时，你可以使用你的反应，掷一粒 d12。将你的体质调整值与骰掷的结果相加，降低该总和的伤害。

驱雷掣电（风暴巨人）Storm’s Thunder (Storm Giant)。 当你受到来自 60 尺内生物的伤害时，你可以用你的反应动作对该生物造成 1d8 雷鸣伤害。

巨化形体 Large Form。 从第 5 级开始，你可以用附赠动作将自己体型变为大型（只要你所处的空间大小足够）。转变持续 10 分钟，或者直到你主动结束（无需动作）。在这段时间内，你进行力量检定具有优势，你的速度增加 10 尺。当你使用此特质后，直到你完成一次长休为止都不能再次使用。

身强力壮 Powerful Build。 你为挣脱被 &Reference[Grappled] 而进行的豁免检定具有优势。在决定你的载重时，你视作为体型大一级的生物。

You have Advantage on any saving throw you make to end the &Reference[Grappled] condition. You also count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automatically upgrades your size when determining carrying capacity.

original:
Ability Scores: Strength, Dexterity, Wisdom

Feat: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftTavernBrawl]{Tavern Brawler}

Skill Proficiencies: Acrobatics and Perception

Tool Proficiency: Navigator’s Tools

Equipment: Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Dagger}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulNavigators]{Navigator’s Tools}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000]{Rope}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.SsAmWV6YBqeOFihT]{Traveler’s Clothes}, 20 GP; or (B) 50 GP

You lived as a seafarer, wind at your back and decks swaying beneath your feet. You’ve perched on barstools in more ports of call than you can remember, faced mighty storms, and swapped stories with folk who live beneath the waves.
translation:
属性值： 力量、敏捷、感知

专长： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftTavernBrawl]

技能熟练： 体操和察觉

工具熟练： 领航工具

装备： 选择 A 或 B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulNavigators], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.SsAmWV6YBqeOFihT], 20 GP; 或 (B) 50 GP

你就像海员一样生活，风吹拂在背上，脚下是摇晃的甲板。当你在停泊港落脚的回忆里总是酒吧里的高脚凳。你直面猛烈的风暴，与那些在波涛下生活的人们聊着过去。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Enhanced Unarmed Strike. When you hit with your Unarmed Strike and deal damage, you can deal Bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 plus your Strength modifier instead of the normal damage of an Unarmed Strike.

Damage Rerolls. Whenever you roll a damage die for your Unarmed Strike, you can reroll the die if it rolls a 1, and you must use the new roll.

Improvised Weaponry. You have proficiency with improvised weapons.

Push. When you hit a creature with an Unarmed Strike as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can deal damage to the target and also push it 5 feet away from you. You can use this benefit only once per turn.

Foundry Note

The proficiency is automatically granted by this feature.

The Enhanced Unarmed Strike activity includes the damage change.
translation:
你将获得以下增益。

强化徒手打击 Enhanced Unarmed Strike。 当你使用徒手打击命中并造成伤害时，你可以造成 1d4 加你的力量调整值的钝击伤害，而不是徒手打击的普通伤害。

伤害重掷 Damage Rerolls。 每次为徒手打击掷伤害骰时，如果掷出 1，则可以重骰一次，但你必须使用重骰的结果。

临时武器 Improvised Weaponry。 你拥有临时武器的熟练项。

推撞 Push。 在你的回合中，当你使用攻击动作中的徒手打击命中一个生物时，你可以对目标造成伤害并将其推离你 5 尺。该增益在一回合中只能使用一次。

Foundry Note

该专长会自动授予熟练项

强化徒手打击行动包含着伤害值的变动。

original:
Ability: Wisdom

Utilize: Plot a course (DC 10), or determine position by stargazing (DC 15)
translation:
属性 Ability: 感知

利用 Utilize: 计划路线（DC 10），或通过观星判断位置（DC 15）

original:
As a Utilize action, you can tie a knot with Rope if you succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. The Rope can be burst with a successful DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check.

You can bind an unwilling creature with the Rope only if the creature has the &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated], or &Reference[Restrained] condition. If the creature’s legs are bound, the creature has the Restrained condition until it escapes. Escaping the Rope requires the creature to make a successful DC 15 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check as an action.
translation:
以一个利用动作，你可以进行一次DC 10 的敏捷（巧手）检定。如果该检定成功，你能用绳索打一个结。扯坏绳索需要通过一次DC 20 的力量（运动）检定。

你可以利用绳索捆住一个非自愿生物，但该生物必须处于 &Reference[Grappled], &Reference[Incapacitated] 或 &Reference[Restrained] 状态。如果你绑住了该生物的腿，该生物陷入束缚状态，直至挣脱。挣脱绳索需要该生物使用动作来通过一次DC 15 的敏捷（特技）检定。

original: A set of clothes worn by travellers.
translation: 旅行服装是为应对多种环境而设计的结实服装。

original: An Explorer’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBedroll0000]{Bedroll}, 2 flasks of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil}, 10 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000]{Rope}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}, 10 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTorch000000]{Torches}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]{Waterskin}.
translation: 探索套组包含以下物品：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBedroll0000], 2 扁瓶 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000], 10 天份 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRope0000000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00], 10 根 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTorch000000] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]。

original: A Bedroll sleeps one Small or Medium creature. While in a Bedroll, you automatically succeed on saving throws against extreme cold (see the Dungeon Master ’s Guide).
translation: 一卷铺盖能睡下一个小型或中型生物。躺在铺盖中时，你自动通过抵抗极寒的豁免检定（详见地下城主指南）。

original:
You can douse a creature, object, or space with Oil or use it as fuel, as detailed below.

Dousing a Creature or an Object. When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing an Oil flask. Target one creature or object within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or be covered in oil. If the target takes Fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute), the target takes an extra [[/damage 5 type=fire]] damage from burning oil.

Dousing a Space. You can take the Utilize action to pour an Oil flask on level ground to cover a 5-foot-square area within 5 feet of yourself. If lit, the oil burns until the end of the turn 2 rounds from when the oil was lit (or 12 seconds) and deals 5 Fire damage to any creature that enters the area or ends its turn there. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Fuel. Oil serves as fuel for Lamps and Lanterns. Once lit, a flask of Oil burns for 6 hours in a Lamp or Lantern. That duration doesn’t need to be consecutive; you can extinguish the burning Oil (as a Utilize action) and rekindle it again until it has burned for a total of 6 hours.
translation:
你能将燃油泼在一个生物、物件或一处空间上，你也可以将燃油作为燃料使用。具体使用方法如下。

泼洒一个生物或一个物件。 当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将你的一次攻击替换为丢出一扁瓶燃油。你可以选择位于你 20 尺内可见的一个生物或物件作为目标。该目标必须通过一次敏捷豁免（DC等于 8 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的熟练加值），失败则被燃油覆盖。如果目标在燃油挥发前（1 分钟后）受到任何火焰伤害，则目标因燃烧的燃油受到额外[[/damage 5 type=fire]]伤害。

泼洒一处空。 以一个利用动作，你可以将一扁瓶燃油泼在地面上，以覆盖一块边长 5 尺且保持水平的方形区域。点燃后，从点燃时算起，燃油会持续燃烧两轮并在回合结束时熄灭（或 12 秒）。点燃时，任何进入该区域或在该区域结束其回合的生物都会受到 5 点火焰伤害。同一生物每回合只受该伤害作用一次。

燃料。 燃油能作为油灯和提灯的燃料使用。一旦点着，一扁瓶的燃油可以在油灯和提灯中持续燃烧 6 小时。持续时长并不需要是连续的，你可以熄灭点着的燃油（以一个利用动作），并在之后再点燃，直到总共燃烧了 6 小时。

original: Rations consist of travel-ready food, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts. See “Malnutrition” in the rules glossary for the risks of not eating.
translation: 口粮由适合长途旅行携带的食物组成，包含肉干、风干水果、饼干和坚果等。不进食的危害详见术语汇编中的 &Reference[Malnutrition] 部分。

original: A Tinderbox is a small container holding flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a Candle, Lamp, Lantern, or Torch—or anything else with exposed fuel—takes a Bonus Action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.
translation: 火绒盒是一种装有打火石、火镰和火绒（通常是浸泡在燃油里的干布料）的小型容器，其中的物品可以用来点火。你可以使用附赠动作来用它点燃任何具有燃料的东西——例如蜡烛、油灯或火把。在没有燃料的情况下生火需要 1 分钟时间。

original: A Torch burns for 1 hour, casting Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. When you take the Attack action, you can attack with the Torch, using it as a Simple Melee weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1 Fire damage.
translation: 火把点燃后能够燃烧 1 小时，燃烧期间发出 20 尺半径的明亮光照和额外 20 尺的微光光照。当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将火把当作简易近战武器，并使用火把发动攻击。命中时，目标受到 1 点火焰伤害。

original: A Waterskin holds up to 4 pints. If you don’t drink sufficient water, you risk &Reference[dehydration].
translation: 水袋具有 4 品脱容量。如果你喝水不足，你会遭受 &Reference[dehydration] 的危害（见规则详述）。

original: If you don’t drink sufficient water, you risk &Reference[dehydration].
translation: 如果你没有喝足够的水，你就有风险陷入 &Reference[脱水] 状态。

original:
A Fierce Warrior of Primal Rage

Core Barbarian Traits

Primary Ability

Strength

Hit Point Die

D12 per Barbarian level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Strength and Constitution

Skill Proficiencies

Choose 2: Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, or Survival

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple and Martial weapons

Armor Training

Light and Medium armor and Shields

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepGreataxe00]{Greataxe}, 4 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepHandaxe000]{Handaxes}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagExplorersPa]{Explorer’s Pack}, and [[/award 15GP]]; or (B) [[/award 75GP]]

Barbarians are mighty warriors who are powered by primal forces of the multiverse that manifest as a Rage. More than a mere emotion—and not limited to anger—this Rage is an incarnation of a predator’s ferocity, a storm’s fury, and a sea’s turmoil.

Some Barbarians personify their Rage as a fierce spirit or revered forebear. Others see it as a connection to the pain and anguish of the world, as an impersonal tangle of wild magic, or as an expression of their own deepest self. For every Barbarian, their Rage is a power that fuels not just battle prowess, but also uncanny reflexes and heightened senses.

Barbarians often serve as protectors and leaders in their communities. They charge headlong into danger so those under their protection don’t have to. Their courage in the face of danger makes Barbarians perfectly suited for adventure.

Becoming a Barbarian …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Barbarian Traits table.
  • Gain the Barbarian’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Barbarian Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Barbarian Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency with Martial weapons, and training with Shields.
  • Gain the Barbarian’s level 1 features, which are listed in the Barbarian Features table.
translation:
原始狂怒的刚猛斗士 A Fierce Warrior of Primal Rage

野蛮人核心特质 Core Barbarian Traits

关键属性

力量

生命骰

每野蛮人等级 D12

豁免熟练

力量和体质

技能熟练

从驯兽、运动、威吓、自然、察觉或生存中选择两项

武器熟练

简易武器、军用武器

护甲受训 Armor Training

轻甲、中甲以及护盾

起始装备

选择 A 或 B：（A）巨斧、4把手斧、探索套组和15 GP；或（B）75 GP

野蛮人是强大的战士，他们由多元宇宙的原初力量所驱动，而这股力量便是“狂暴”。野蛮人的狂暴不只是一种情感，而且是猎食者在绝境中激发的凶暴，是暴风雨般不顾一切的猛袭，也是大海中翻滚不息的波涛。

一些野蛮人将“愤怒”具象化为凶蛮的灵体，或敬仰的先祖。另一些野蛮人却认为狂暴与世界的痛苦悲伤皆有联系，还有人认为狂暴是来自狂野魔法的无情纠缠，更有些人认为，狂暴是他们内心最深处，一种自我的表达。对所有野蛮人来说，而这种狂暴不止为每个野蛮人点燃其战斗狂热，更是他们灵活闪避，抵挡伤害和增强力量的源泉。

野蛮人通常扮演着社群的保护者和领导者。他们往往只身冲向危险，只为保护他人。面对危险的勇气使野蛮人非常适合冒险。

成为野蛮人...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“野蛮人核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“野蛮人特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“野蛮人核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰、熟练军用武器、盾牌训练。
  • 获得“野蛮人特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

original:
You can imbue yourself with a primal power called Rage, a force that grants you extraordinary might and resilience. You can enter it as a Bonus Action if you aren’t wearing Heavy armor.

You can enter your Rage the number of times shown for your Barbarian level in the Rages column of the Barbarian Features table (currently [[lookup @scale.barbarian.rages]]). You regain one expended use when you finish a Short Rest, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

While active, your Rage follows the rules below.

Damage Resistance. You have Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

Rage Damage. When you make an attack using Strength—with either a weapon or an Unarmed Strike—and deal damage to the target, you gain a bonus to the damage that increases as you gain levels as a Barbarian, as shown in the Rage Damage column of the Barbarian Features table.

Strength Advantage. You have Advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.

No Concentration or Spells. You can’t maintain Concentration, and you can’t cast spells.

Duration. The Rage lasts until the end of your next turn, and it ends early if you don Heavy armor or have the Incapacitated condition. If your Rage is still active on your next turn, you can extend the Rage for another round by doing one of the following:

  • Make an attack roll against an enemy.
  • Force an enemy to make a saving throw.
  • Take a Bonus Action to extend your Rage.

Each time the Rage is extended, it lasts until the end of your next turn. You can maintain a Rage for up to 10 minutes.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automates the Resistance and additional damage. This feature will also automatically recharge your Rage uses on a Short and Long Rest.
translation:
你可以将名为狂暴的原初之力赋予己身，为你带来超越常规的伟力和韧性。未着装重甲时，你可以以一个附赠动作进入狂暴。

你可以进入狂暴的次数见野蛮人特性表中“狂暴次数”一栏。 (当前 [[lookup @scale.barbarian.rage]])。当你完成一次短休时，你重获一次已使用的狂暴次数；当你完成一次长休时，你重获所有已使用的狂暴次数。

你的狂暴激活期间，你将遵循以下这些规则：

伤害抗性 Damage Resistance。 你具有钝击，穿刺和挥砍伤害的抗性。

狂暴伤害 Rage Damage。 当你使用力量发动一次攻击并对目标造成伤害时（无论这是一次武器攻击还是一次徒手打击），你的伤害掷骰获得额外加值，这个加值随着你的野蛮人等级提升，见野蛮人特性表中“狂暴伤害”一栏。

力量优势 Strength Advantage。 你的力量检定和力量豁免具有优势。

无法专注或施法 No Concentration or Spells。 你无法保持专注Concentration，也不能施展法术。

持续时间 Duration。 狂暴持续到你的下一个回合结束，如果你穿戴重甲或陷入失能Incapacitated状态，狂暴提前结束。如果在你的下一回合你的狂暴仍处于激活状态，你可以执行以下选项之一令你的狂暴延长一轮：

  • 对敌人进行一次攻击检定。
  • 迫使一名敌人进行一次豁免检定。
  • 以一个附赠动作延长你的狂暴。

每当狂暴被延长，都会持续到你的下一个回合结束。你可以维持狂暴至多10分钟。

Foundry Note

该特性包含一个主动效果，能自动实现抗性以及额外伤害。此特性还会在短休和长休时自动恢复你的狂暴次数。

original: While you aren’t wearing any armor, your base Armor Class equals 10 plus your Dexterity and Constitution modifiers. You can use a Shield and still gain this benefit.
translation: 你未着装任何护甲期间，你的基础AC等于 10 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的体质调整值。你可以使用 盾牌 Shield 而仍然从此特性获益。

original:
Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery properties of two kinds of Simple or Martial Melee weapons of your choice, such as Greataxes and Handaxes. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can practice weapon drills and change one of those weapon choices.

When you reach certain Barbarian levels, you gain the ability to use the mastery properties of more kinds of weapons, as shown in the Weapon Mastery column of the Barbarian Features table.
translation:
你对武器的训练使你能够运用两种自选的简易或军用近战武器的精通属性，例如巨斧和手斧。

当你完成一次长休后，你可以重新演练武器技巧，来改变你所选择的其中一个武器类型。

当你获得特定的野蛮人等级时，你还可以使用更多种类武器的精通属性，具体数据见野蛮人特性表中“武器精通”一栏。

original:
Ability: Charisma

Utilize: Play a known tune (DC 10), or improvise a song (DC 15)
translation:
属性： 魅力

操作： 演奏一个熟知的曲调（DC 10），或是演奏一首即兴的乐曲（DC 15）

original: While wearing a Costume, you have Advantage on any ability check you make to impersonate the person or type of person it represents.
translation: 若你穿着对应的戏服，你为模仿他人或模仿某一类人所作的任何属性检定都具有优势。

original: A handheld steel Mirror is useful for personal cosmetics but also for peeking around corners and reflecting light as a signal.
translation: 手持式钢制镜子不仅适用于个人化妆，还可以用来窥视角落和反射光线作为信号。

original: Perfume comes in a 4-ounce vial. For 1 hour after applying Perfume to yourself, you have Advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks made to influence an Indifferent Humanoid within 5 feet of yourself.
translation: 香水通常装在 4 盎司的小瓶里。为自己拍上香水后的 1 小时里，你为影响对你态度冷漠的类人生物所作的魅力（游说）检定都具有优势，但这个生物必须位于你的 5 尺内。

original: Traveler’s Clothes are resilient garments designed for travel in various environments.
translation: 旅行者服装是为在各种环境中旅行而设计的耐用衣物。

original: An Entertainer’s Pack contains the following items: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000]{Backpack}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBedroll0000]{Bedroll}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBell0000000]{Bell}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.UkWdyJYQTfVX2cJW]{Bullseye Lantern}, 3 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCostume0000]{Costumes}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMirror00000]{Mirror}, 8 flasks of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil}, 9 days of @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000]{Rations}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]{Waterskin}.
translation: 艺人套组包含以下物品：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBackpack000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBedroll0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBell0000000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.UkWdyJYQTfVX2cJW], 3 套@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCostume0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMirror00000], 8 瓶@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagOil00000000], 9 天份@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagRations0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTinderbox00] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagWaterskin00]

original:
Ability: Charisma

Utilize: Play a known tune (DC 10), or improvise a song (DC 15)
translation:
属性： 魅力

操作： 演奏一个熟知的曲调（DC 10），或是演奏一首即兴的乐曲（DC 15）

original:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell’s range.
translation:
你在施法距离内创造至多四个火把大小的光源，使其在法术持续时间内看起来如同火把、灯笼或悬浮珠。或者，你可以将四个光源合并为一个发光的中型形态，使其看上去像一个模糊的人形。无论你选择哪种形态，每个光源都会发出 10 尺半径的微光光照。

 用一个附赠动作，你可以将光源移动至多 60 尺至施法距离内的一处空间。一个由此法术创造的光源必须距另一个光源 20 尺内，而离开施法距离的光源会随即熄灭。

original:
You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at one creature you can see or hear within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d6 Psychic damage and have Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

Cantrip Upgrade. The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), and 17 (4d6).
translation:
你对施法距离内一名你可见或可听的生物连珠炮式地释出一串蕴涵微妙惑控的侮辱。目标必须成功于一次感知豁免，否则受到 1d6 点心灵伤害，且其下一回合结束前进行的下一次攻击检定具有劣势。

戏法强化： 你到达特定等级时，其伤害增加 1d6（5 级2 d6、11 级 3d6、17 级 4d6）

original: The target has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.
translation: 你的下一回合结束前进行的下一次攻击检定具有劣势。

original:
One Humanoid you can see within range makes a Wisdom saving throw. It does so with Advantage if you or your allies are fighting it. On a failed save, the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.
translation:
选择法术距离内你可见的一名类人生物，迫使该生物进行一次感知豁免，如果你或者你的同伴正在与它战斗，它进行的这次豁免将具有优势。如果它豁免失败，它陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态直到法术结束，或者直到你或你的同伴对它造成伤害。被魅惑的生物将对你友好。在法术结束时，生物会知道它曾被你魅惑。

升环施法：使用的法术位每高一环，你就可以额外选择一个生物作为目标。

original: the target has the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition until the spell ends or until you or your allies damage it. The Charmed creature is Friendly to you. When the spell ends, the target knows it was Charmed by you.
translation: 目标陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态直至法术结束，或在你或你的盟友对它造成伤害时提前结束。魅惑生物将对你友好。当法术结束时，目标会知道它曾被你魅惑。

original: You launch a dazzling array of flashing, colorful light. Each creature in a 15-foot Cone originating from you must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or have the &Reference[blinded apply=false] condition until the end of your next turn.
translation: 你射出一道炫目的闪耀彩光。以你为源点的 15 尺锥状区域内的每个生物必须成功通过一次体质豁免，否则陷入 &Reference[blinded apply=false] 状态，持续至下个你的回合结束。

original:
One creature of your choice that you can see within range hears a discordant melody in its mind. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 3d6 Psychic damage and must immediately use its Reaction, if available, to move as far away from you as it can, using the safest route. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 1.
translation:
一名施法距离内你选择的可见生物的心灵中听见一段不协和旋律。目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败则受到 3d6 点心灵伤害，并立即执行其反应（若可用）尽可能往远离你的方向移动，并采取最安全的路径。豁免成功则只受一半伤害。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，伤害就提高 1d6。

original:
A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains Hit Points equal to 2d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d4 for each spell slot level above 1.
translation:
你指定施法距离内一个你能看见的生物并恢复其生命值，恢复量等于 2d4 + 你的施法属性调整值。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d4 点。

original: A Bedroll sleeps one Small or Medium creature. While in a Bedroll, you automatically succeed on saving throws against extreme cold (see the Dungeon Master ’s Guide).
translation: 一卷铺盖能睡下一个小型或中型生物。躺在铺盖中时，你自动通过抵抗极寒的豁免检定（详见地下城主指南）。

original: When rung as a Utilize action, a Bell produces a sound that can be heard up to 60 feet away.
translation: 以一个利用动作，你可以摇响一个铃铛，铃铛会发出 60 尺内都能够听到的声音。

original: A bullseye lantern casts bright light in a 60-foot cone and dim light for an additional 60 feet. Once lit, it burns for 6 hours on a flask (1 pint) of oil.
translation: 一盏油灯使用燃油作为燃料，点着时能够发出 60 尺远锥形的明亮光照和额外 60 尺远的微光光照。

original:
You can douse a creature, object, or space with Oil or use it as fuel, as detailed below.

Dousing a Creature or an Object. When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing an Oil flask. Target one creature or object within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or be covered in oil. If the target takes Fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute), the target takes an extra [[/damage 5 type=fire]] damage from burning oil.

Dousing a Space. You can take the Utilize action to pour an Oil flask on level ground to cover a 5-foot-square area within 5 feet of yourself. If lit, the oil burns until the end of the turn 2 rounds from when the oil was lit (or 12 seconds) and deals 5 Fire damage to any creature that enters the area or ends its turn there. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Fuel. Oil serves as fuel for Lamps and Lanterns. Once lit, a flask of Oil burns for 6 hours in a Lamp or Lantern. That duration doesn’t need to be consecutive; you can extinguish the burning Oil (as a Utilize action) and rekindle it again until it has burned for a total of 6 hours.
translation:
你能将燃油泼在一个生物、物件或一处空间上，你也可以将燃油作为燃料使用。具体使用方法如下。

泼洒一个生物或一个物件。 当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将你的一次攻击替换为丢出一扁瓶燃油。你可以选择位于你 20 尺内可见的一个生物或物件作为目标。该目标必须通过一次敏捷豁免（DC等于 8 + 你的敏捷调整值 + 你的熟练加值），失败则被燃油覆盖。如果目标在燃油挥发前（1 分钟后）受到任何火焰伤害，则目标因燃烧的燃油受到额外[[/damage 5 type=fire]]伤害。

泼洒一处空。 以一个利用动作，你可以将一扁瓶燃油泼在地面上，以覆盖一块边长 5 尺且保持水平的方形区域。点燃后，从点燃时算起，燃油会持续燃烧两轮并在回合结束时熄灭（或 12 秒）。点燃时，任何进入该区域或在该区域结束其回合的生物都会受到 5 点火焰伤害。同一生物每回合只受该伤害作用一次。

燃料。 燃油能作为油灯和提灯的燃料使用。一旦点着，一扁瓶的燃油可以在油灯和提灯中持续燃烧 6 小时。持续时长并不需要是连续的，你可以熄灭点着的燃油（以一个利用动作），并在之后再点燃，直到总共燃烧了 6 小时。

original: Rations consist of travel-ready food, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts. See “Malnutrition” in the rules glossary for the risks of not eating.
translation: 口粮由适合长途旅行携带的食物组成，包含肉干、风干水果、饼干和坚果等。不进食的危害详见术语汇编中的 &Reference[Malnutrition] 部分。

original: A Tinderbox is a small container holding flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a Candle, Lamp, Lantern, or Torch—or anything else with exposed fuel—takes a Bonus Action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.
translation: 火绒盒是一种装有打火石、火镰和火绒（通常是浸泡在燃油里的干布料）的小型容器，其中的物品可以用来点火。你可以使用附赠动作来用它点燃任何具有燃料的东西——例如蜡烛、油灯或火把。在没有燃料的情况下生火需要 1 分钟时间。

original: A Waterskin holds up to 4 pints. If you don’t drink sufficient water, you risk &Reference[dehydration].
translation: 水袋具有 4 品脱容量。如果你喝水不足，你会遭受 &Reference[dehydration] 的危害（见规则详述）。

original: If you don’t drink sufficient water, you risk &Reference[dehydration].
translation: 如果你没有喝足够的水，你就有风险陷入 &Reference[脱水] 状态。

original:
Tieflings are either born in the Lower Planes or have fiendish ancestors who originated there. A tiefling (pronounced TEE-fling) is linked by blood to a devil, a demon, or some other Fiend. This connection to the Lower Planes is the tiefling’s fiendish legacy, which comes with the promise of power yet has no effect on the tiefling’s moral outlook.

A tiefling chooses whether to embrace or lament their fiendish legacy.

Chthonic

Tieflings who have the chthonic legacy feel not only the tug of Carceri but also the greed of Gehenna and the gloom of Hades. Some of these tieflings look cadaverous. Others possess the unearthly beauty of a succubus, or they have physical features in common with a night hag, a yugoloth, or some other Neutral Evil fiendish ancestor.

Tiefling Traits

Creature Type: Humanoid

Size: Medium (about 4–7 feet tall) or Small (about 3–4 feet tall), chosen when you select this species

Speed: 30 feet

As a Tiefling, you have the following special traits.

Darkvision. You have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

Fiendish Legacy. You are the recipient of a legacy that grants you supernatural abilities.

When you reach character levels 3 and 5, you learn a higher-level spell, as shown on the table. You always have that spell prepared. You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the legacy).

Otherworldly Presence. You know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you cast it with this trait, the spell uses the same spellcasting ability you use for your Fiendish Legacy trait.

Fiendish Legacies
Level 1Level 3Level 5
You have Resistance to Necrotic damage.You also know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplChillTouch]{Chill Touch} cantrip.@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFalseLife0]{False Life}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofEnfee]{Ray of Enfeeblement}
translation:
提夫林要么是一开始就出生在下层位面，要么就是血脉被下层位面的邪魔浸污。提夫林（读作TEE-fling）是与魔鬼、恶魔或其他邪魔有血缘关系的存在。这种与下层位面的链接带给了提夫林某种邪魔遗赠，这是一种应许的力量，但不会影响提夫林自身的道德观。

提夫林需要选择他们想要接受或者厌恨的的邪魔遗赠

幽冥

拥有幽冥邪魔遗赠的提夫林不仅能感受到卡瑟利 Carceri的泥淖，也能感受到焦炎地狱 Gehenna中的贪婪，哈迪斯 Hades中的阴暗。这些提夫林中，有的肤色苍白，彷如死尸。另一些则如同梦魔与魅魔般美丽，还有的则是有着与其那夜鬼婆、尤格罗斯魔或其他中立邪恶的邪魔先祖相似的身体特征。

提夫林特质

生物类型： 类人

体型：中型（约 4 - 7 尺高）或小型（约 3 - 4 尺高），在选择该物种时进行选择

速度： 30 尺

作为提夫林，你有以下特殊特质：

黑暗视觉。你拥有60尺黑暗视觉。

邪魔遗赠。 你承载着一份给予了你超自然能力的邪魔遗赠。从邪魔遗赠表格中选择其一。你获得该遗赠的 1 级好处。

当你到达 3 级和 5 级时，你分别学会一道表格上更高级的法术；你时刻准备着这道习得的法术，且可以不消耗法术位施展此法术一次 ，当你完成一次长休后，你重获施展该道法术的能力。你也可以用任何你拥有的相应环阶法术位施展该道法术。智力、感知或魅力，是你用此特质施展法术时的关键属性（当你选择遗赠时选择属性）。

异界存在。 你习得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg] 戏法。当你用此特质施展它时，这道法术的施法属性与你邪魔遗赠特性所用的属性的相同。

幽冥遗赠
1 级 3 级 5 级
你获得对暗蚀伤害的抗性。你习得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplChillTouch]戏法。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFalseLife0] @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofEnfee]

original:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.

Altered Eyes. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

Booming Voice. Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] checks.

Fire Play. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

Invisible Hand. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

Phantom Sound. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

Tremors. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.
translation:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

original:
You know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy} cantrip. When you cast it with this trait, the spell uses the same spellcasting ability you use for your Fiendish legacy trait.

Foundry Note

When you're granted this spell it will allow you to choose your spellcasting ability.
translation:
你习得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{奇术} 戏法。当你用此特质施展它时，这道法术的施法属性与你邪魔遗赠特性所用的属性的相同。

Foundry 注

当你获得此法术时，它会允许你选择你的施法关键属性。

original:
You are the recipient of a legacy that grants you supernatural abilities.

When you reach character levels 3 and 5, you learn a higher-level spell, as shown on the table. You always have that spell prepared. You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the legacy).

Chthonic

Tieflings who have the chthonic legacy feel not only the tug of Carceri but also the greed of Gehenna and the gloom of Hades. Some of these tieflings look cadaverous. Others possess the unearthly beauty of a succubus, or they have physical features in common with a night hag, a yugoloth, or some other Neutral Evil fiendish ancestor.

Chthonic Legacy Traits
Level 1Level 3Level 5
You have Resistance to Necrotic damage.You also know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplChillTouch]{Chill Touch} cantrip.@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFalseLife0]{False Life}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofEnfee]{Ray of Enfeeblement}

Foundry Note

The Resistance and spells are granted to you automatically and you will be prompted to choose the spellcasting ability during advancement.
translation:
你属于一支精灵血系，并因此获得了超自然能力。

当你到达 3 级和 5 级时，你分别习得一道表格上更高级的法术；你时刻准备着这道习得的法术，且可以不消耗法术位施展此法术一次，当你完成一次长休后，你重获施展该道法术的能力。你也可以用任何你拥有的相应环阶法术位施展该道法术。

木精灵血系特性
1 级3 级5 级
你的速度提升至 35 尺。你习得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]{德鲁伊伎俩} 戏法。@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLongstride]{大步奔行}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPasswithou]{行动无踪}

Foundry 注

在你选择种族和升级的时候会自动获得相关的特性和法术。

original:
Ability Scores: Strength, Dexterity, Charisma

Feat: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftMusician000]{Musician}

Skill Proficiencies: Acrobatics and Performance

Tool Proficiency: Choose one kind of Musical Instrument

Equipment: Choose A or B: (A) Musical Instrument (same as above), 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCostume0000]{Costumes}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMirror00000]{Mirror}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPerfume0000]{Perfume}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.SsAmWV6YBqeOFihT]{Traveler's Clothes}, 11 GP; or (B) 50 GP

You spent much of your youth following roving fairs and carnivals, performing odd jobs for musicians and acrobats in exchange for lessons. You may have learned how to walk a tightrope, how to play a lute in a distinct style, or how to recite poetry with impeccable diction. To this day, you thrive on applause and long for the stage.
translation:
属性值：力量、敏捷、魅力

专长： @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.feats.Item.phbftMusician000]

技能熟练：体操和表演

工具熟练： 选择一种 乐器

装备： 选择 A 或 B： (A) 乐器(如上所述), 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCostume0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagMirror00000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPerfume0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagClothesTrav], 11 GP; 或 (B) 50 GP

你年轻时大部分时间都在参加巡回演出和嘉年华会，为音乐家和杂技演员们做零工以换取学习的机会。你可能已经学会了如何走钢丝，如何弹奏风格独特的鲁特琴，或是用怎样无可挑剔的发音方式吟诵诗歌。而现如今，你在喝彩声中茁壮成长，渴望登上舞台。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Instrument Training. You gain proficiency with three Musical Instruments of your choice.

Encouraging Song. As you finish a Short or Long Rest, you can play a song on a Musical Instrument with which you have proficiency and give Heroic Inspiration to allies who hear the song. The number of allies you can affect in this way equals your Proficiency Bonus (currently [[lookup @prof]]).

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically grant the proficiencies. You can toggle the "Edit" mode in the "Details" tab of your sheet and click on the cog next to "Tools" underneath your Skills to choose your Musical Instrument proficiencies.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

乐器训练。你自选三项乐器，获得其熟练项。

鼓舞之歌。当你完成短休或长休后，你可以用你熟练的乐器演奏一首歌曲，并给予听到这首乐歌的盟友一个英雄激励。以这种方式所能影响的盟友数量，最多等于你的熟练加值 (现在 [[@prof]])。

Foundry 贴士

此特性没有自动提供熟练项。在角色卡的“详细” 一栏切换至编辑模式，点击技能下方的“工具”旁的齿轮图标来修改乐器的熟练项。

original:
An Inspiring Performer of Music, Dance, and Magic

Core Bard Traits

Primary Ability

Charisma

Hit Point Die

D8 per Bard level

Saving Throw Proficiencies

Dexterity and Charisma

Skill Proficiencies

Choose any 3 skills

Weapon Proficiencies

Simple weapons

Tool Proficiencies

Choose 3 Musical Instruments

Armor Training

Light armor

Starting Equipment

Choose A or B: (A) @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbarmLeatherArm]{Leather Armor}, 2 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbwepDagger0000]{Daggers}, Musical Instrument of your choice, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagEntertainer]{Entertainer's Pack}, and [[/award 19gp]]; or (B) [[/award 90GP]]

Invoking magic through music, dance, and verse, Bards are expert at inspiring others, soothing hurts, disheartening foes, and creating illusions. Bards believe the multiverse was spoken into existence and that remnants of its Words of Creation still resound and glimmer on every plane of existence. Bardic magic attempts to harness those words, which transcend any language.

Anything can inspire a new song or tale, so Bards are fascinated by almost everything. They become masters of many things, including performing music, working magic, and making jests.

A Bard's life is spent traveling, gathering lore, telling stories, and living on the gratitude of audiences, much like any other entertainer. But Bards' depth of knowledge and mastery of magic sets them apart.

A Bard's Repertoire

Does your Bard beat a drum while chanting the deeds of ancient heroes? Strum a lute while crooning romantic tunes? Perform arias of stirring power? Recite dramatic monologues from classic tragedies? Use the rhythm of a folk dance to coordinate the movement of allies in battle? Compose naughty limericks?

When you play a Bard, consider the style of artistic performance you favor, the moods you might invoke, and the themes that inspire your own creations. Are your poems inspired by moments of natural beauty, or are they brooding reflections on loss? Do you prefer lofty hymns or rowdy tavern songs? Are you drawn to laments for the fallen or celebrations of joy? Do you dance merry jigs or perform elaborate interpretive choreography? Do you focus on one style of performance or strive to master them all?

Becoming a Bard …

As a Level 1 Character

  • Gain all the traits in the Core Bard Traits table.
  • Gain the Bard's level 1 features, which are listed in the Bard Features table.

As a Multiclass Character

  • Gain the following traits from the Core Bard Traits table: Hit Point Die, proficiency in one skill of your choice, proficiency with one Musical Instrument of your choice, and training with Light armor.
  • Gain the Bard's level 1 features, which are listed in the Bard Features table. See the multiclassing rules in chapter 2 to determine your available spell slots.
translation:
以音乐、舞蹈和魔法激励人心的表演家

吟游诗人核心特质

关键属性

魅力

生命骰

每吟游诗人等级 D8

豁免熟练

敏捷与魅力

技能熟练

任选 3 项技能（见第 1 章）

武器熟练

简易武器

工具熟练

任选 3 种乐器（见第 6 章）

护甲受训

轻甲

起始装备

选择 A 或 B：(A) 皮甲、2 把匕首、自选乐器、艺人套组和 19 GP；或(B) 90 GP

吟游诗人通过音乐、舞蹈和诗歌施展魔法，是鼓舞他人、抚慰伤痛、打击敌人和制造幻象的能手。他们认为多元宇宙是被“说”出来的，而那原初的“创世真言”至今在各个位面回响。诗人的音乐就是对这回响的一种操控，试图将其编织成所需的法术与力量。
任何事物都可以激发他们创作出新的歌曲或故事，所以诗人往往对万事万物都具有好奇心。他们的知识广博如同大海，演奏音乐施展魔法都是信手拈来，缓和气氛也是一把好手。
吟游诗人的一生都在大地巡游中度过，他们搜集逸闻、分享故事、然后享受听众的掌声。这跟一般艺人其实没区别，只是在知识的深度，音乐技巧的层次，对魔法的触动上，吟游诗人就不能和那些普通货色相比了。

成为吟游诗人...

作为 1 级角色

  • 获得“吟游诗人核心特质”表中的所有特质。
  • 获得“吟游诗人特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。

作为兼职角色

  • 获得“吟游诗人核心特质”表中的以下特质：生命骰，一项自选技能的熟练，一种自选乐器的熟练，以及轻甲训练。
  • 获得“吟游诗人特性”表中列出的 1 级特性。请参阅第 2 章中的兼职规则来确定你的可用法术位。

i

original:
Channeling the chill of the grave, make a melee spell attack against a target within reach. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 Necrotic damage, and it can’t regain Hit Points until the end of your next turn.

Cantrip Upgrade. The damage increases by 1d10 when you reach levels 5 (2d10), 11 (3d10), and 17 (4d10).
translation:
你引导出来自坟墓的刺骨阴冷，对目标进行一次近战法术攻击。命中时，目标将受到1d10点暗蚀伤害，并且直至你下一回合的结束前都无法恢复生命值。

戏法强化： 法术的伤害会在你到达下列等级时增加 1d10：5 级（2d10）、11 级（3d10）以及 17 级（4d10）。

original: The target can’t regain Hit Points until the end of your next turn.
translation: 目标无法恢复生命值直至你的下一回合结束。

original:
You can supernaturally inspire others through words, music, or dance. This inspiration is represented by your Bardic Inspiration die, which starts as a d6 (currently, [[lookup @scale.bard.inspiration.die]]).

Using Bardic Inspiration. As a Bonus Action, you can inspire another creature within 60 feet of yourself who can see or hear you. That creature gains one of your Bardic Inspiration dice. A creature can have only one Bardic Inspiration die at a time.

Once within the next hour when the creature fails a D20 Test, the creature can roll the Bardic Inspiration die and add the number rolled to the d20, potentially turning the failure into a success. A Bardic Inspiration die is expended when it's rolled.

Number of Uses. You can confer a Bardic Inspiration die a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

At Higher Levels. Your Bardic Inspiration die changes when you reach certain Bard levels, as shown in the Bardic Die column of the Bard Features table. The die becomes a d8 at level 5, a d10 at level 10, and a d12 at level 15.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking when a character has Bardic Inspiration to use.

Recovery is set to long rest (for levels before @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdFontOfInsp]{Font of Inspiration} is gained). Please manually adjust as required.
translation:
你可以通过语言、音乐或舞蹈对他人实现一种超自然的鼓舞。这种鼓舞表现为数个“诗人激励骰”，骰面为 d6 （当前， [[/lookup @scale.bard.inspiration.die]]）。

使用吟游诗人激励。以一个附赠动作，你鼓舞身边 60 尺内另一个能听到你声音或能看见你的生物。该生物获得一枚诗人激励骰。一个生物在同一时间只能拥有一个诗人激励。

在接下来的 1 小时内，该生物进行 D20 检定失败时可以使用该激励骰，以将其结果加到掷骰结果中，并可能让结果转为成功。吟游诗人激励骰在掷出时消耗。

使用次数。你能够赋予他人激励骰的次数等于你的魅力调整值（最少一次）。完成一次长休后，你将重获所有已消耗的诗人激励次数。

在更高等级。当你达到特定吟游诗人等级时，你的诗人激励骰会发生变化，如吟游诗人特性表中“诗人激励骰”一栏所示。5 级时骰面变为 d8，10 级时骰面变为 d10，15 级时骰面变为 d12。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个主动效果，用于跟进角色何时拥有可使用的吟游诗人激励。

恢复设定为长休（在获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.classes.Item.phbbrdFontOfInsp]{激励之源} 之前）。需要时请手动调整。

original: You have received Bardic Inspiration. Once within the next hour when you fail a D20 Test, you can roll the Bardic Inspiration die and add the number rolled to the d20, potentially turning the failure into a success. A Bardic Inspiration die is expended when it's rolled.
translation: 在接下来的 1 小时内，该生物进行 D20 检定失败时可以使用该激励骰，以将其结果加到掷骰结果中，并可能让结果转为成功。吟游诗人激励骰在掷出时消耗。

original:
You have learned to cast spells through your bardic arts. See @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{chapter 7} for the rules on spellcasting. The information below details how you use those rules with Bard spells, which appear in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]{Bard spell list}.

Cantrips. You know two cantrips of your choice from the Bard spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDancingLig]{Dancing Lights} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplViciousMoc]{Vicious Mockery} are recommended.

Whenever you gain a Bard level, you can replace one of your cantrips with another cantrip of your choice from the Bard spell list.

When you reach Bard levels 4 and 10, you learn another cantrip of your choice from the Bard spell list, as shown in the Cantrips column of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbBard000000000.JournalEntryPage.V8pqIWlaL9GhY61t#class-features]{Bard Features} table.

Spell Slots. The Bard Features table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your level 1+ spells. You regain all expended slots when you finish a Long Rest.

Prepared Spells of Level 1+. You prepare the list of level 1+ spells that are available for you to cast with this feature. To start, choose four level 1 spells from the Bard spell list. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]{Charm Person}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplColorSpray]{Color Spray}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDissonantW]{Dissonant Whispers}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word} are recommended.

The number of spells on your list increases as you gain Bard levels, as shown in the Prepared Spells column of the Bard Features table. Whenever that number increases, choose additional spells from the Bard spell list until the number of spells on your list matches the number on the table. The chosen spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots. For example, if you're a level 3 Bard, your list of prepared spells can include six spells of levels 1 and 2 in any combination.

If another Bard feature gives you spells that you always have prepared, those spells don't count against the number of spells you can prepare with this feature, but those spells otherwise count as Bard spells for you.

Changing Your Prepared Spells. Whenever you gain a Bard level, you can replace one spell on your list with another Bard spell for which you have spell slots.

Spellcasting Ability. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for your Bard spells.

Spellcasting Focus. You can use a Musical Instrument as a Spellcasting Focus for your Bard spells.
translation:
你在你的吟游艺术中学会了如何施展法术。参见 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.mh3akteBDiLegqFK]{第 7 章} 有关施法的规则。下述信息将详述如何将这些规则应用于吟游诗人法术，吟游诗人法术详见本章后文职业描述中的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI]。

戏法。你已知2个你选择的吟游诗人戏法。推荐选择 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDancingLig] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplViciousMoc]

每当你获得一个吟游诗人等级时，你都能将通过此特性已知的其中一个戏法替换为另一个你所选择的吟游诗人戏法。

当你的吟游诗人等级达到4级和10级时，你都能习得另一个你所选择的吟游诗人戏法，如吟游诗人特性表中戏法一列所示。 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.wwia6Wwo4BgE9GSI] 。

法术位。“吟游诗人特性”表记录了你有多少法术位用以施展 1+ 环阶的法术。当你完成一次长休时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术位。

准备 1+ 环法术。通过该特性施法前，你需要选择数个可用的 1+ 环阶法术构成准备列表。首先，从“吟游诗人法术列表“中选择四个 1 环法术。推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplColorSpray]、 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDissonantW] 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor] 。

准备列表上的法术数量将随着你的吟游诗人等级而增加，正如“吟游诗人特性”表中“准备法术”一栏所示。每当该数量增加时，从“吟游诗人法术列表”中选择额外的法术来添加到你的准备列表中，直到你准备列表上的法术数量与“吟游诗人特性”表中的数量相匹配。你只能准备已经获得相应环阶法术位的法术。例如，作为一个 3 级吟游诗人，你的准备法术列表应该包括六个任意组合的 1 环或 2 环法术。

如果其他的吟游诗人特性给予了额外的已准备法术，这些法术不会计入你在该特性中的准备法术数量，但是这些法术对你而言仍算作吟游诗人法术。

改变你的准备法术。每当你获得一个吟游诗人等级时， 你可以将准备列表中的一个法术，替换为另一个你拥有法术位的吟游诗人法术。

施法属性。魅力是你施展吟游诗人法术的施法属性。

施法法器。你可以使用乐器作为吟游诗人法术的施法法器。
